trans-unit.source: Provides a common implementation of members for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供的成员的一个常见实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ListControl class provides implementations of common elements for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: ListControl 类提供的常见元素实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 以下属性是数据绑定的用户的主要关注事项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list enables selection of list items.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示列表是否启用列表项的选择。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list enables list item selection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列表启用列表项选择;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>与此控件关联。

trans-unit.source: The DataManager property is valid if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 数据管理器属性才有效如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this is not a data-bound control, the default is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这不是数据绑定控件，则默认将`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>与此控件关联。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此数据源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法以填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以将对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also add objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the DataSource, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以添加到对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>通过使用数据源， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性，以填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When the DataSource property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 当设置数据源属性时，用户不能修改项集合。

trans-unit.source: If setting the DataSource property causes the data source to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的 DataSource 属性将导致数据源，若要更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: If setting this property causes the data member to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性将导致数据成员，若要更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you set DataSource to `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 当设置数据源为`null`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>设置为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interfaces, such as a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> or an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Collections.IList>或<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref>接口，如<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>或<xref:System.Array>。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不实现<xref:System.Collections.IList>或<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to display for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示此属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> can display diverse types of objects.
trans-unit.target: 继承控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>可以显示不同类型的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of DisplayMember is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果该对象上不存在指定的属性或 DisplayMember 的值为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果`ToString`改为显示方法。

trans-unit.source: If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置新的显示成员，则会保持设置的上一个显示成员。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> specifying the name of an object property that is contained in the collection specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>在指定的集合中指定的对象属性包含名称<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 检索的当前值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>项，如果它是一个对象，对象的属性提供的项。

trans-unit.target: 对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>项绑定到。

trans-unit.source: The filtered object.
trans-unit.target: 经过筛选的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> item, if it is a property of an object given the item and the property name.
trans-unit.target: 返回的当前值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>项，如果它是给定项和属性名称的对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The object the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> item is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>项绑定到。

trans-unit.target: 项的属性名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>绑定到。

trans-unit.source: The filtered object.
trans-unit.target: 经过筛选的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is bound to a data value.
trans-unit.target: 该控件绑定到数据值时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Format event is raised before each visible item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> is formatted.
trans-unit.target: 格式引发事件的每个可见项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>设置的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件，可以访问此列表项，通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>显示的字符串

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> that provides custom formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.IFormatProvider>可提供自定义格式设置行为。</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Setting the FormatInfo property will override the default formatting behavior, which uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 设置 FormatInfo 属性将重写默认格式设置行为，它使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider>提供自定义格式设置行为的实现。</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo*>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示如何显示值的格式说明符字符。

trans-unit.source: The format string used must follow standard [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] format specifications.
trans-unit.target: 使用的格式字符串必须遵循标准[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的格式规范。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的格式设置类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The string of format-specifier characters that indicates how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指示如何显示值的格式说明符字符字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether formatting is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将格式设置应用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the FormattingEnabled property to `true` causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> event to be raised for each visible member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: 将 FormattingEnabled 属性设置为`true`引起<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>的每个可见成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>引发的事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and FormattingEnabled are related as follows: - If FormattingEnabled is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>，而 FormattingEnabled 之间相互关联，如下所示:-如果 FormattingEnabled `false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>将不能设置为-1 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>为空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If FormattingEnabled is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: -如果 FormattingEnabled 是`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>将设置为-1 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>为空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果格式设置的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>属性是启用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the property is not specified, the value returned by GetItemText is the value of the item's method. Otherwise, the method returns the string value of the member specified in the property for the object specified in the item parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果<> *1> 未指定属性，而 GetItemText 返回的值的项的值方法。否则，该方法返回的字符串值中指定的成员<> *1> 属性中指定的对象 item 参数。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The OnFormat method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 格式化方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.target: OnValueMemberChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the data of the object at the specified index with the contents of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，会重新同步的指定索引处的对象与数据源的内容的数据。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item whose data to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 项的从零开始索引要刷新其数据。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the item data with the contents of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，会重新同步项数据与数据源的内容。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取或设置当前选定项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 为负一 (-1) 如果未不选定任何项则返回值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the member property specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定的成员属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: If a property is not specified in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, SelectedValue returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果在不指定属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>，SelectedValue 返回的结果`ToString`方法的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, SelectedValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when SelectedValue is blank.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>SelectedValue，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>相关，如下所示:-如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>不会在 SelectedValue 为空时设置为-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when SelectedValue is blank.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`true`， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>SelectedValue 为空时将设置为-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the member of the data source specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含指定的数据源的成员的值的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the object with the specified index in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写，当在派生类中设置具有指定索引的对象。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的数组索引。

trans-unit.source: The object.
trans-unit.target: 对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the specified array of objects in a collection in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写，当在派生类中的集合中设置指定的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of items.
trans-unit.target: 项的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的实际值作为中的各项的属性路径<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specify the contents of the ValueMember property in cases where you bind data.
trans-unit.target: 在将数据绑定的情况下指定的 ValueMember 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can clear the ValueMember property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将属性设置为一个空字符串清除的 ValueMember 属性 ("") 或`null`。

trans-unit.source: Setting a new ValueMember property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 设置新的 ValueMember 属性会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing a single property name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示单个属性名称的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>属性值或可解析为最终的数据绑定对象的属性名称的句点分隔属性名称的层次结构。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The specified property path cannot be resolved through the object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 无法解析指定的对象通过指定的属性路径<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
